alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 2:32AM PST until December 15 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast including the Gold Beach, Port Orford, Cape Blanco, and Bandon areas as well as along the coastal headlands. Portions of Highway 101 near Pistol River, Gold Beach, Port Orford, and Bandon could be affected. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be especially difficult, due to the combined effects of strong, gusty winds, and heavy rainfall, at times. This could also result in some mud and rockfall in and near slide areas. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
